alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 9:23AM CST until December 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall across the basin is expected to produce minor flooding on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect at Selden. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 79.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 92.5 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
